participant_1.background:
I'm not too concerned with my appearance, because I'm more focused on my studies.
my car has to be as fast as my motorcycle.
my favorite beer is coors.
I remember my mother reading to me every night before bed.
I am a construction worker, and I take pride in my work.

participant_2.background:
I took medication to help with my dust allergy so I could write my book.
my favorite music is country.
My phone will be out and ready to capture the best moments at the festival this weekend!
I once wrote a short story about the cop who pulled me over and read it to him while he was writing my ticket.
My pets are my best friends and they make me laugh every day.

content.text: How are you doing this evening?
I am doing well! Just getting ready for a country music festival this weekend!
Oh that sounds like fun! What band are you most looking forward to seeing?
I am really looking forward to seeing Jason Aldean, but I am also excited to see Luke Bryan and Florida Georgia Line.
Oh I love Jason Aldean! I saw him in concert a few years ago and it was amazing!
That is awesome! I am so excited to see him live for the first time.
What kind of music do you like to write?
I like to write all sorts of music, but my favorite is country music.
Oh that is cool! I love country music too!
What's your favorite country music song?
I have a lot of favorite country music songs, but one of my favorites is "Friends in Low Places" by Garth Brooks.
That is a great song! I love Garth Brooks!
Me too! He's one of my favorite country music artists.
Oh you're in for a treat! He's amazing live!
I can't wait to see him!
